name: Medial (Playdate)
description:
There are many variations on the Soduku style of puzzle. I've seen this variant in printed soduku books but as far as I know I'm not aware of a computerised version of it.

I've added some extra tweaks to the variation I've seen before so hopefully this will be a unique Playdate title!

Features

  • 3 Difficulty levels
  • Hundreds of levels
  • Multiple variations of the central game type
